Uses of Package
com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder

  • Packages that use com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder 
    Package Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder  
    com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder.io  
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder used by com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder 
    Class and Description
    InputProperty
    Parent class of all (groups of) properties that make up an InputState .
    InputProperty.AsyncProperty
    Abstract class parenting all classes of input, which can not be read directly from Gdx.input but instead are supplied to the program using specified callbacks.
    InputProperty.AsyncProperty.PlaceholderText
    Description of the outcome of a getPlaceholderText request.
    InputProperty.AsyncProperty.Text
    Description of the outcome of a getText request.
    InputProperty.AsyncPropertyVisitor
    An interface to enable the visitor pattern on InputProperty.AsyncPropertys.
    InputProperty.StaticProperties
    A struct to aggregate all properties that a libGdx environment can exhibit.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty
    Base class of all input values that are directly passed to the program.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.Accelerometer
    A struct to store the three axis values of the accelerometer in.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.Button
    Class to store the state of the three possible buttons of a mouse.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.KeyEvent
    Similar to InputProperty.SyncProperty.KeyPressed, but closer to the high-level key events of the platforms libGdx targets.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.KeyEvent.Type
    Description of the exact KeyEvent type, as libGdx' target platform events use them.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.KeyPressed
    A class indicating that a key was either pressed or has stopped being pressed.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.KeyPressed.Type
    Describes whether a key press has begun or finished.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.Orientation
    A struct storing all information there is regarding a device's orientation.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.Pointer
    A class to aggregate all position information that is emitted by the use of a single touch pointer or mouse, not considering buttons or touch states.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.PointerEvent
    Event whose implementation closely resembles the platform specific mouse events of libGdx' target platforms.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.PointerEvent.Type
    Superset of all types of pointer events (called "touch" in libGdx) that the different target platforms involve.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty.Type
    Enum helping to create the selection flags used by some methods like InputState.set(InputState, int).
    InputProperty.SyncPropertyVisitor
    An interface to enable the visitor pattern on InputProperty.SyncPropertys.
    InputRecorderConfiguration
    A class to configure new instances of InputRecorder
    InputState
    A snapshot of all real-time values to be read from an input at a certain time.
    PlaybackListener
    Listener interface for providing callbacks to an InputPlayer for getting notified on various occasions during a playback
    RecordProperties
    Class to encapsulate additional information about a record to be able to play it back later.
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder used by com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder.io 
    Class and Description
    InputProperty.AsyncProperty
    Abstract class parenting all classes of input, which can not be read directly from Gdx.input but instead are supplied to the program using specified callbacks.
    InputProperty.AsyncProperty.PlaceholderText
    Description of the outcome of a getPlaceholderText request.
    InputProperty.AsyncProperty.Text
    Description of the outcome of a getText request.
    InputProperty.StaticProperties
    A struct to aggregate all properties that a libGdx environment can exhibit.
    InputProperty.SyncProperty
    Base class of all input values that are directly passed to the program.
    RecordProperties
    Class to encapsulate additional information about a record to be able to play it back later.
